summary: No explicit requirements or acceptance criteria were provided in the BuildRequest. The diff modifies the Motoko backend (adding/expanding data types and admin/user-gated endpoints such as Android APK URL management and events CRUD) and updates project_state.json summary/metadata, but with no stated requirements there is nothing to verify against.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded backend functionality for Android APK URL management with admin permission checks (getAndroidApkUrl/setAndroidApkUrl).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest lists no requirements; this functionality is new behavior not tied to any requested item.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded backend events management API (getEvents/getEvent/createOrUpdateEvent/deleteEvent) with admin permission checks for mutations.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest lists no requirements; this functionality is new behavior not tied to any requested item.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project scope/summary metadata to include UI/navigation refinements, sharing/accessibility, APK distribution goals, and Google Ads/AdSense readiness.
